item.description:
Our group is growing so fast that I see several exciting things to come.We will very soon outgrow the meeting room we are in.This time there will be a format that is more coherent( a presentation,then round robin,the raffle,then wrapup).There will be time for networking before(if you come early) and afterward for those who stay.I do see the possibility of turning away some people,if too many show up,sorry.dale
P.S. I also see the possibility that we will have to create an "Insiders" type of group to manage the group.
item.name: Greater Boston REal Estate Investors Club(Who will qualify?)
